export var htmlExample = " Prettier \xB7 Opinionated Code Formatter

Prettier
  • Playground
  • About
  • Usage
  • Blog
  • GitHub
Try It Out
Get Started
Options

What is Prettier?

  • An opinionated code formatter
  • Supports many languages
  • Integrates with most editors
  • Has few options

Why?

  • You press save and code is formatted
  • No need to discuss style in code review
  • Saves you time and energy
  • And more

WebStorm

Built-in support
Got more? Send a PR

Get Started

  1. Add prettier to your project: 
    yarn add prettier --dev --exact

    npm install prettier --save-dev --save-exact
  2. Verify by running against a file: 
    yarn prettier --write src/index.js

    npx prettier --write src/index.js
  3. Run prettier when commiting files: 
    yarn add pretty-quick husky --dev

    npm install pretty-quick husky --save-dev
    Then edit package.json: 
    {
  "scripts": {
    "precommit": "pretty-quick --staged"
  }
}
yarnnpm

sourcesContent:
export const htmlExample =` Prettier · Opinionated Code Formatter

Prettier
  • Playground
  • About
  • Usage
  • Blog
  • GitHub
Try It Out
Get Started
Options

What is Prettier?

  • An opinionated code formatter
  • Supports many languages
  • Integrates with most editors
  • Has few options

Why?

  • You press save and code is formatted
  • No need to discuss style in code review
  • Saves you time and energy
  • And more

Works with the Tools You Use

miniprettier

Sublime Text

JsPrettier

Vim

neoformat
ale
vim-prettier

Visual Studio

JavaScriptPrettier

VS Code

prettier-vscode
unibeautify-vscode

WebStorm

Built-in support
Got more? Send a PR

Get Started

  1. Add prettier to your project: 
    yarn add prettier --dev --exact

    npm install prettier --save-dev --save-exact
  2. Verify by running against a file: 
    yarn prettier --write src/index.js

    npx prettier --write src/index.js
  3. Run prettier when commiting files: 
    yarn add pretty-quick husky --dev

    npm install pretty-quick husky --save-dev
    Then edit package.json: 
    {
  "scripts": {
    "precommit": "pretty-quick --staged"
  }
}
